card_tooltips.english:
When a [debuff] is applied to this unit, it gains additional stacks equal to the stacks of [mt2_sandscourged.Plugin_hex].
[mt2_sandscourged.Plugin_hex] and [dazed] are excluded.
Decreases every turn and does not [propagate].
card_tooltips.chinese:
当获得[debuff]时，每有一层[mt2_sandscourged.Plugin_hex]，单位获得的层数 +1，[mt2_sandscourged.Plugin_hex]和[dazed]除外。
回合结束时，层数减少 1。
无法被[propagate]。
